display_long_description:
***Includes cross-buy on Rift!**

Challenge your friends in a PvP VR Horror game 👻

Feel the thrill of a hunt in a 1v1 Duel or up to 1v3 Hide and Seek mode that will push your wits, perceptiveness, and courage to their very limits 😱 Employ a wide array of items, triggers, and skills tailored to your class to outsmart and defeat your adversary - a terrifying, lifeforce-draining Ghost or a dauntless, vigilant Hunter. All of this set in spine-chilling locations such as a haunted Mansion, Mines, or a horrid Orphanage.

Features:

• Meta Quest x PCVR Crossplay 

• Challenge your friends in a spooky horror PvP system with 1v1 and up to 1v3 modes [media]

• Two unique classes with dedicated skills and items [media]
• A suspenseful vibe of psychological horror [media]
• Haunted locations abound with possibilities and usable environment elements [media]
• Skins to customize your favorite character [media]
• Events and updates with new content to the game

Challenge your friends in a PvP VR Horror game 👻

Feel the thrill of a hunt in a 1v1 Duel or up to 1v3 Hide and Seek mode that will push your wits, perceptiveness, and courage to their very limits 😱 Employ a wide array of items, triggers, and skills tailored to your class to outsmart and defeat your adversary - a terrifying, lifeforce-draining Ghost or a dauntless, vigilant Hunter. All of this set in spine-chilling locations such as a haunted Mansion, Mines, or a horrid Orphanage.

Features:

• Meta Quest x PCVR Crossplay 

• Challenge your friends in a spooky horror PvP system with 1v1 and up to 1v3 modes ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39035354_3856821554549115_8285971767033229490_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=0pgqb5w8N5sQ7kNvwGVescH&_nc_oc=AdlGPBqmNDc0DEK5KRSqHeQ5xvQyhp1tE7o74tZWGGGBC3ucJ35XWn98e-DZ_cjuCcc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=WnNZ_hYuKBxPyL4faSxlSw&oh=00_AfFfRDi2TxaOMZ8YBYV7YfTlM_7pr5FatU_k6-B9z2z8jw&oe=67FFEEEF)

• Skins to customize your favorite character ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974666_2071028533330368_239625305590008056_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=okYLuHi2Tj0Q7kNvwG72qnV&_nc_oc=AdlG0QPlztlU72boHnPlHSOTcz6d9fZai_htuIZgsY7J03GIRH937phq76BcGWWm4vQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=WnNZ_hYuKBxPyL4faSxlSw&oh=00_AfGYJA-r8qmQtDgonIVlC-WciWYU5jc_RGx8I-Gnbb93sQ&oe=67FFFAAB)
